Make sure you know what type of keyboard layout you’re getting
Please remember to zoom in on the product from all angles
I failed to do this and I received a French keyboard layout
I ended up just ordering a new upper case with US keyboard integrated and replaced it myself for less than 40 bucks
Otherwise great product I love the backlit keyboard
